attributes.action: CCTV to be available to all care recipients and their families
attributes.additional_details:
CCTV should be readily available to all relatives of people in a care environment be it in their own homes or in residential care.
The monitoring should be available to relatives to monitor from their homes even if they have to initially purchase the camera/s.
In bathrooms where privacy is required there must always be two members of staff to attend to personal issues when camera's are not available.
We are monitored in town centres, shops, supermarkets, train stations etc there should be no less of a standard when it comes to the care of the elderly and vulnerable.
Homes not agreeing should have to make it clear they refuse and this made public in their adverts or at inital interviews
